div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem sexto
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said day was accusit for tribulance of Johnne colisone ande ane seruand
womane of his callit Elene ande brekin of ane say

The said day alexander hay accusit for tribulance of robert pipar and the said alexander
was accusit for the tribulance of the court ande denyit ale the saide tribu
lance and past furtht of the court ande wald nocht entir agane and normund'
leslie at command of the prouest ande bailyeis chargit him anys tuyis thrys
with his wand of office tile entir in the court tile ansuer for the said tribulance
quhilk wald nocht entir ande dissobeyit the said officiar and he brek his wand
one hyme

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem Septimo
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said day James colisone Williame futhes robert crag Duncan colisoun'
Androue lousone Williame murray Johnne of murray gilbert litster and'
richerd litstar was chosin to be suorne consider' and vnderstand the skath
done to vij pipis of wad pertening to Johnne andersone et cetera

The said day the prouest ande baillies assignit monunday that next
cumis to Dauid falconar of balandroue tile ansuer to the borgh' fundin
one him be thomas leslie procurator for Elizibetht leslie the relict'
of vmquhile Alexander menyheis for the wranguis' withhaldin fra
hir of ane hours' wortht xl s' or thar by

The said day Johnne Andersone Johnne murray yongar Johnne of
Kintor richerd Wricht Dauid Wricht alexander sclatar and Williame sclatar
was chosin ande suorne the gret aitht to pris' the skath done to the
landis of vmquhile Dauid blinseill sen' his deces' eftir the tenour
of Souerane lordis lettres directt' tharupoun

Curia Balliuorum burgi de Abirdene Tenta In pretorio eiusdem
octauo die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said day Johnne thomsone ande James smitht at the quenys
fery oblist thame coniunctlie and seueralie be the faithtis of thar bodijs
to deliuer to patry leslie ane of the baillies of the said burgh' thar
boitfull of lyne within the havin of Abirdene et cetera als' sone as vynd
and weddir wile serue hir for xij s' the chaldir

The said day Androue crak was conuict' be his avin tong grant
for the forstalling of the burgh in bying of woll hydis ande skynnis
for the quhilkis he was in thre amerciamentis of the courtis

The said day for the cessin of tribull in vnite ande concord to be
had betuix thomas menyheis one that ane part and' Johnne Kennerty
one that vthir part the said thomas ande Dauid menyheis his
brothir ande the said Johnne band and oblist thame be the faithtis
of thar bodijs that handis wphaldin tile abid ande stand at
the ordinance of the prouest and' counsaile present for the tyme
quhilkis riply auisit deliuerit and ordanit that the said party
sale stand ale tymis to cum in ayfald kyndnes and tendirnes
and' gif ony of thame happinnis tile Inquiet vex or tibull
vthir in word or deid and beis conuikit tharof sale pay tene
pundis to sanct Nicholace wark and sett souerte tharfor furtht
with the said partijs sale pay x s' for the bailyeis vmlawis et cetera
the said thomas menyeis fand thomas leslie souerte for the
said tene pundis the said Johnne Kennerty fand gilbert
menyeis prouest souerte for vthir tene pundis gif ony of thaim
tribulis vthir the said thomas menyeis come souerte for
the said Dauid his brothir for vthir tene pundis and ilkan
of the said personis oblist thame to freitht thar said borrouis
be thar handis and gudis

The said day the bailyeis chargit Alexander sclatar to mende
the hous' pertenyng to Jonet of Kintor the relict of Johne
stevinsone with vj sclatis stanis and thai ordanit Isabell of cullan to
pay the said sclatar for his labour

Eodem die compertum fuit per Inquisicionem curie quod Johannes mar est legittimus et
propinquior heres quondam alexandri mar patris suj comburgenses dictj burgj Igitur
dederunt balliuis in mandatis ad cognoscendum prefatum Johannem ad terras
et annuos redditus sibj per decessum dicti quondam patris suj pertinenciis secundum lau
dabiles consuetudines burgorum terrarum cartarum suarum et cetera

Eodem die Will Agnes hay fecit constituit et ordinauit Willelmum blakhale de
eodem patricium rede coniunctim et diuisim suos procuratores ad prosequendum mariotam clerk sponsam
thome straloche pro vno le paner cardis et cetera agendum defendendum promittens rato et grato

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene' tenta in pretorio Eiusdem xo die mensis
Julij Anno quo supra

Inquisicio facta apud burgum de Abirdene decimo die mensis Julij anno Domini Millesimo
quingentesimo octauo Coram honorabilibus viris gilberto menyeis preposito et Willelmo portar
vno balliuorum dicti burgi In pretorio eiusdem protribunali sedentibus per subscripti videlicet
Johannem leslie de Warderis Johannem ruthirfurd militem andream cullan Johannem
colisone Willelmum de blakhale de eodem Willelmum futhes Dauid leslie de petcapill
Karolum stevinsone cuthbertum Johnstone Alexandrum malysone Andream lousone
andream Waus et Jacobum gourlawe burgenses dicti burgi Quj Juratj dicunt
quod quondam Johannes lammyntone auus Johannis smitht latoris presencium obiit vltimo
vestitus et sasitus vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis de vna terra
Jacente infra dictum burgum in futy inter terram quondam thome glenmaluyn ex australi ex vna
et terram alexandrum mathousone ex boreali partibus ab altera Et communionem viam regiam versus occidens extendens in longitudine ad le linkis versus oriens Et quod dictus Johannes smitht est legittimus et
propinquior heres eiusdem quondam Johannis auj suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est
legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annuum xiij Solidos et quatuor denarios
Et valuit sex solidos et octo denarios in tempore pacis Et quod tenentur in capite
de suppremo domino nostro rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus
domini nostri regis legittime per se ipsum ob decessum quondam dicti Johannis auj suj per spacium septem
annorum aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis datis et clausulis
Sub sigillo dicti balliuj Et sigillis quorundam eorum quj dicte Inquisicionj inter erant
faciendum anno die mense et loco prenotatis

The said day William murray pinor was conuikit be ane suorne assis' Johne'
colisone forspekar for tribulance of Androue seidlar and for tribulance of Alexander nory and of
his hous' for the quhilkis he was in thre amerciamentis of the court et cetera and to mend as law will
and forber in tym to cum and he sale pay v s' to the said androue ande gif euer the said William
commitis ony trubulance in tym to cum and beis conuikit tharof he salbe expellit the toune

The said day it was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' ser Johne' ruthirfurd forspekar
that Dauid falconar of balandroue sale preif this day xv dais within the said
tolbutht in the bailye court that Elizibetht lesliez' seruand sone that kepit hir'
hors' persewit be the said Elizibetht vpone the said Dauid resauit the
said hors' fra ane serwand in the kirkhill quhome to the said lard
of balandroue deliuerit the said hors' in keping in the kirkhill

Curia balliuorum de Abiredene' tenta In pretorio eiusdem vndecimo die mensis
Julij Anno Dominj et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Syme of fleschear was inamerciament of the court be ane
suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd forspekar for the wranguis' strublance
of canny Eduardsone the wif of Johnne ramsay and till amend as law
will and forber in tyme tocum And the said canny quyt of all strublance of
the said Symon' And atour for the offens done to the said canny It was
ordand' quhen he is warnit be the officiar and ask the said canny forgevnes
on' his kneis for the said offens And sall pay to the haly blud licht ane
pund' of wax in continent And gif euire he commitis sic ane lik falt
till ony burges wif in tyme to cum and beis conuict' tharof sall pay xl s' to
sanct nicholes werk vnforgevin

The said day Sandy lammyntone was inamerciament of the court be ane
suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd forspekar for the strublance of canny
eduardsone And the said agnes quyt of all strublance of the said Sandy
And atour the said Sandy sall ask the said Agnes forgevnes for the
strublance done to hir at the merkat cors'

The said day J gilbert tulideff was in americament of the court be
ane suorne assis' ser Johnne ruthirfurd' forspekar for the breking of common'
ordinance in the menissing of the pais' of the breid gevin to him be the tovn'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem duodecimo
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said day Androu Dvne baxter was inamerciament of the court be
his avin tong grant for the breking of common' ordinance and mynnissing
and breking of the pais' of breid' gevin to hyme be the tovne and till amend'
as law will and forbeir in tyme tocum

The said Androu Dvne baxter inamericmanent of the court be his avin
toung grant for thebreking of the pais' of the breid' and making of ane
laif les thane ane vthir

The said day gilbert tulideff was inamericament of the court be ane suorne
assis' thomas leslie forspekar for the breking of the pais' in the baking
of ry breid' aganis the statutis of the tovnne and till amend as law
will and forber in tyme tocum And' atour it was ordanit be the said assis'
that the said gilbert sall pay ane li' of wax to the haly blud licht vnforgevin
in conteinent And gif euire he committis sic ane falt agane and beis conuict'
tharof sall pay xl s' to sanct nicholes werk vnforgiffin

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvto
die mensis Julij Anno quosupra

The said day the bailyeis continewit the actioun' debatabile betuix ser thomas
bynne chaplane and Johnne' andersone anent tua merkis of annuell rent aucht
to the said ser thomas eftir the tenour of his chartir of ane land liand in the
gallougat of the quhil the said Johnne is possessout of ane part of the samyn
to friday nixt eftir the hamcumin of the Prouoist and gudmen of the towne
now being at the montht

The said day the complaynt followit be ser Johnne' stirueling in strintht
of ane borght one Androw bavne for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of ix schillingis
of butht maill was fundin of awaill be ane suorne assis' William
blakhall forspekar for the quhilkis the said Androw was in amerciament
of the court and' aucht to pay the said maill

The said day ser Johnne stiruerling lamentablie complenit to the balyeis
sittand' in Jugment that Androu bawne skynner had gretlie trublit hyme
sayand' that he had rest him in ane fensit court quhilkis tribulance he
wald' nocht has sufferit for jCM pundis besekand' thame of Remeid
of law And thareftir the said was accusit / denyit the said strublance quhilkis
actioun' was put to the decisioun' of ane assis' with consent of baitht the
said partijs Quhilkis riplie auisit the richtis ressonis and allegaciounis witnes
and previs of baitht the said partijs herd sene and vnderstandin deliuerit and
fand' that thai culd' nocht acquit the said Androue fra strublance of the
said ser Johnne'

The said day Androu bawne' was in amerciament of the court be ane suorne
assis' William blakhall forspekar for the strublance of the court And till amend'
as law will and forber in tyme tocum

The said day Dauid Syme warnit lauchfullie be Androu nauchtie
officiar callit and nocht comperit till haue ansuerit at the instance of thomas
chamer of quylits for the wranguis' withhaldin fra him of thre bollis of malt
and demi was in amerciament of the court in falt of presence And that was gevin for dome

The said day the baxtaris of the said burgh' warnit callit and comperit was
accusit for breking of common' ordinance in breking of the pas' and selling of
vnsufficient stuff and for selling of bred nocht equalie to induellaris of the
said burgh' quhilkis denyit and was put to the decisioun' of ane assis'
et cetera And' the said assis' riplie auisit cutht nocht acquit the said baxtaris
for baking of vnsufficient stuff except' Androw gordone and Richerd redhed
be the moutht of thomas leslie forspekar

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio Eiusdem octauo xviijo
die mensis Julij anno quo supra

The said day ale the fleschearis of the said burgh' was conuikit be ane' suorne
assis' thomas leslie fforspekar that thai furnist nocht nor prouidit the toun with
beif as efferis according to thar craft ande for selling of muttone darrar'
thane suld be of resoun in skatting of the toune Ande specialie' in selling of
muttone or it be considirit be the gude mene of the toune for the quhilkis
Ilkane of thame was in amerciamentis of the court et cetera

The said day It was statut' and ordanit be the counsaile present for the tym that ale the
flesouris sale haue beif and muttone enuche to furnis' and sted the tone and that the beif salbe
prisit Ilkane settirday and' nay' sellit quhill it be prisit nor darrar' than it is prisit
And' nay muttone be sellit darrar' than xxxij d' the bouk the best and vthir muttone one lauer'
price eftir the gudnes of It vndir the pane of xl s' to sanct Nicholas wark and
amerciament fo the bailyeis of ilkane of thame that brekis the statut' or ony
pont contenit in it and beis conuikit tharof

The said day ale the baxtaris of the said burgh' excep androue gordone and riche
redhed was conuikit be ane' suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar for the brekyn
of the pace in bakin of vnsufficient stuf in selling of bred to the land or the
tone be seruit and in selling of bred in hiddillis for the quhilkis Ilkane of thaim was in
amerciamentis of the court et cetera

The said day It was statut' ande ordanit be the counsaile present for the tym
that the baxtaris of this burgh' sale sel nay brede of quheit vteuthe the toune nor
nay vthir bred quhile the toune be seruit vndir the pane of brekyn of common
ordinance And the bailyeis ane vnlawe vnforgevin

Curia Balliuourm de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimoprimo die
mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said day Willeame michelsone deponit be his aitht that the lard of ballandro
left ane hors' with hyme in the kirkhill at evin in keping quhill the morne thareftir
And' Johnne' huntaris sone in findone seruand till Elizibetht leslie come till hyme
and' deliuerit him the said hors and as he vndirstandis he was haill and feir'

The saide day the baillies assignit this day viij dais tile Androw fiff tile ansuer
to the borghe' fundin one be Williame Wormet for the wranguis' withhaldin
fra him of demi vnicorne and ij li' wax price v s'

The saide day the balyeis in our Souerane lordis nayme prouest and and tharis commandit
ordanit and chargit ale and Sundrie the flessouris of the saide burghe'
tile obserue and keip the Satutis and actis maid' obefor as thai
and Ilkane of thame wile ansuer' tharapone vndir the panys conte
nit in the Samyn and of breking of commone ordinance

The saide day the ballieis commandit and chargit the baxtaris tile obserue ande
keip the Statutis and actis maid' obefor as thar wile ansuer' thartpone
vndir the panys contenit in the samyn et cetera

The said It was deliuerit be ane suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar
all the said assis' in ane voice concordand that matheus stavyne master and skippar
of ane schip of Rostow sall pay the keill hir of the merchandis gudis that was
in his schip And the said skippar and his marinaris sall pay and deliuer the sex
tvne of ry quhilkis thai sauld to Johnne fechat pertenand to the merchandis that
is to say Walter symsone clais' to the said merchandis
agane or the awaill tharof And that beand' done the said assis' ordand that
said merchandis to deliuer and pay to the said skipper the Remanent of thar fraucht
quhilk ix gutthelingis be thar avin confessioun' and grant

Curia Balliuorum de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiiijto
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said the actioun' persewit be the procuratouris of Elizibetht leslie agane'
Dauid falconer of ballandro anent ane hors was continewit to this day viij
dais to the hamcumin of Johnne of cullane for this deposicioun' to be had in
the said mater

The said day thomas Waus grantit him to Entir William cowy duel
land in scheves this day xv dais befor the prouest and bailyeis till ansuer'
to the clame followit on' him be androw meldrum for xij s'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vicesimo octauo
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra

Eodem die compertum fuit per legittimam Inquisicionem curie precedens quod
thomas craufurd est legitimus et propinquior heres quondam magistri Richardi
craufurd patris suj Ideo datum fuit balliuis in mandatis ad cognoscendum ipsum
ad terras et annuos redditus in quibus ipse magister Richardus obijt vestitus et sasitus
vt de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri regis

The said day ser henry makvilyeame chaplane in Abirdene dischargit
him of ane cuppill of ane hous bocht fra Rob of murray and remittit to the said
Robert xij d' for the bering of the said cuppill to the place that it was In obefor'
quhilk he hed' gevin to him in part of pament of the said Cuppile

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto primo die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

The saide day the prouest and balyeis assignit this day xv dais tile Androw
litstar tile ansuer to the borghe' fundin one him be Jonhne cullane for the wrang
uis' Intrometing with tua barrellis of Salmond' pertening to him perempturlie

The said' day george Wancussinver' Skippar of the hoy of th slois' grauntit and
opinly promittit that he suld' nocht tak bot x s' g' fra James Colisone for his
Sek and x s' fra Androw Cullane for his sek being in his Schipe

The said day Walter symsone Nicholes bynkis ande Robert strathachin
that deponit the gret aithe that the half Schip of Rostow quhilk mathou
Skavene is Skippar and half the gudis and merchandice being in hir' was
Williame of forbes quhilk deit in the saide Schipe and thome andirsone
was nay executouris to him and that he maid' nay executoris
Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiudem quarto die mensis Augusti

The said' day the borghe' fundin one alexander blinsele be thomas leslie for
the wranguis' Intrometing with ane lax of his et cetera was fundin availe and
the alexander awe to restoir' to the said' thomas the lax next the best of
the thre et cetera and he in Amerciament of the court et cetera

The said' day the merchandis grauntit that thai frauchtit Androw Waus' Schip
siclik as thai frauchtit thane baris Schipe

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne cullane forspekar
that the Skippar and the sterisman sale suer' the gret aithe that thai laid'
xij estland' burdis apone the key of Abirdene and bad' Duncan Crail
bad' the Skippar gang his way and he suld' deliuire thame to thame
that awche thame And' this aithe being deponit the skippar and sterisman
ar quyt of the said' burdis

Vniuersis prefidelibus ad quorum noticiam presentes littere peruenerit gilbertus menyeis
prepositus Johannes mar Dauid mar' patricius leslie et Willelmus portar balliui burgi de Abirdene in scocia
salutem et sinceram in domino caritatem suadet eium pietas distat equitas et meritum Inuitat vt nos
super hus que Innocentes et eorum Jura concernunt attestentur veritati Et presertim in hus que
coram Judicibus et officiarijs serenissimj domini nostri regis legitime peraguntur Huic est
quod die dati' presencium portuj nostri opidj Abirdenensis quod nauis de rosto quam sub
deo matheus skabene' rexit ordio frumento sabio tritico farrman' triticia venalibus
onusta applicuit Quas Walterus simsone mercator assertus et debitor dimidietatis
huiusmodi marcanciarum cum nicholaio binkis et roberto strathathin suis coadiutoribus nobis
nostrisque conburgenses pro certa summa pecunie vendidit et deliberauit ad trescentum libras
triginta et vnum solidos monete scocie in libera pecuniam extendes naulo vniuersisque expensis
et omnibus inde factis et sustentis extractis et deductis Ac quondam Willelmus forbes nuper
defunctis in eadem nauj super mar' alterius dimitis habitor secundum tenorem Indenturam desuper
confectum tempore eiusdem Pro qua Isabella forbes eius soror cum suum iure paternitatis
amicis et adherentibus caucionem sufficiens vicibus repetitis instant' peciit et requisierat
vt responsalis proueniat filio ipsius Willelmi sinautem sibj aut suis propinquio
ribus Jus ead eandum habtens prout de Jure incumbit Et consequenter dictam integram
pecuniarum summam prescriptis Waltero nicholayo et roberto vicibus iteratis perobtulimus si
caucionem Ydoneam Inueneruit vt dimitas eiusdem summe Jura habens rediuidet
Quj caucionem minime porrexerant seu habere commisserant asserens quandam partem
et pecunie cuidam thome lumisden' spectantis Non obstantis calump
nijs inquietacionibus allegacionibus et persuacionibus dictarum parcium in premisse ad longeuum
tempus passus caucione fideiussione que per nos multimode petita porrecta seu
in parta dimidietas summe pecunie' ad centum et quinquaginta libras xv s' et vj d' ex
tendens Ac tres pecie cere xx tres petras aut eocirca continens in manibusmeis dicti
gilbertj existunt et spectant ad vtilitatem et commodum ac prouentum eius ad horum Jus habens
quibus parere in premisse tenor seu astringor per aut et diliberari et refundj sine
dilacione Quod omnibus interesse habens presencium serie Innotestimus quibus Sigillum
nomine causarum dicti burgi est appensum apud eundem xvjo die mensis Junij anno Domini Millesimo quingentesimo
octauo Coram honorabilibus et famosis viris Johanne ruthirfurd milito Johanne cullan andrea
cullan Johanne colisone Jacobo colisone thoma leslie burgensibus dictj burgj Et domino
Johanne Stirueling notario publico

The said day Androw fyf lauchfullie warnit callit and nocht comperit to ansuer to the borghe
fundin one him be William Wormet for the wranguis' haldin fra him of demi vnicorne and j li'
wax price iiij s' tharfor the balyeis chargit William scrimgeour officiar to pas' and tak ane
stres of the saide Androw and lat it to borghe and it be askit and warne him to compir one mo
the xxi day of August Instant tile ansuer to the saide borghe'

The saide day the court wardit schew for law and It was gevin for dome that
Dauid falconer of ballinandrow has falyeit in his preiwe of ane hors'
follouit be Elizibeth leslie the relict of vmquhile Alexander menyeis price xl s'
quhilk he borrouit fra hir and tuk to preiw the said' hors' deliuerit agan
to hir seruand' eftir the tenor of the actis maide tharapone Obefor for the
quhilkis the saide Dauid was in Amerciament of the court et cetera Ande aw to pay the
saide hors' or the Some of xl s' as said' Is to the saide Elizibetht

Curia Balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem septimo
die mensi Augusti Anno Domini et cetera quingentesimo octauo

The said day Robert Waus was conuikit be ane suorne assis' James
collisone forspekar for tribulance of alexander Kintor gilbertis sone
And the said alexander conuict' for tribulance of the said robert Nocht
withstanding the gretast triblance was fundin in the said robert for the
quhilkis ilkane of thame was in amerciament of the court et cetera and' till amend'
as law will and forber' in tyme tocum

The said day Adam Waus fiff was conuict' be ane suorne assis' James
collisone forspeaker for strublance of alexander Kintor gilbertis sone
And the said alexander conuict for tribulance of the said Adam Nocht with
standing the gretast strulance was fundin in the said Adam for the
quhilkis ilkane of thame was in amerciament of the court et cetera And till
amend as law will and forber in tyme to cum

The said day Robert prat was conuict be ane suorne assis' James
collisone fospekar for strublance of alexander Kintor Ande the said alexander
quit of aw strublance of the said Robert And the bodie of all the strublance
of the premiss' was fundin in the said Robert

head.add: plegij legales inter prat et Kintor'

div.p:
Eodem die dauid straloche I deuenit plegius legalis quod Robertus prat
erit indempnes pro alexandro Kintor gilbertj aliter quam per viam Juris Et
Johannes cullane deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus robertus erit indempnes
pro dicto alexandro aliter quam per viam Juris Karolus stevinsone deuenit
plegius legalis quod dictus robertus prat erit indempnes pro Dauid Kintor
aliter quam per viam Juris Idem Dauid Kintor deuenit plegius quod dictus
Robertus erit indempnes pro Johanne Kintor aliter quam per viam Juris
Alexander menyeis deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Robertus erit indempnes
pro matheo branche aliter quam per viam Juris Et Idem matheus deuenit
plegius legalis quod dictus Robertus erit Indempnes pro Johannem branche aliter
quam per viam Juris Et Dauid Kintor deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus
Robertus erit indempnes pro alexandro malisone aliter per quam viam Juris
Et dictus Robertus prat Robertus Waus thomas Waus et Johannes
collison' deuerunt plegij legales quod dicte persone erunt indempnes pro
ipso roberto prat aliter per quam viam Juris Et Iidem robertus prat
Robertus Waus thomas obligabant se ad releuandum dictum
Johannem collisone de huiusmodi fideiussione Insuper omnes dicte persone
ex vtraque parte obligantur fide media per ostensionem manuum suarum bona et
terras ac conseruandum suos plegios indempnes de huiusmodi fideiussione

The said day robert Waus and adame fyf grantit to pay to the gudman Johne' of cullan the sext
part of four gret lax that thai had and Intromettit with the tym of the tribulance done tile alexander Kintor

The said day alane litstar protestit that he mucht haue Justice ande lawe of Dauid grig tile
androw litstar his sone for tribulance done tile him and thai aggreit nocht
